short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a set of Lacemarket usernames and their sale items will be hidden from view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows people who browse Lacemarket to hide the items of a set list of sellers. This allows you to keep scalpers' items out of your search and browse results. You control the seller list, and can add and remove sellers as you want.

** Version 1.1.1 is out, which should fix the page change issue. **

- Item listings for sellers in your block list are removed from your view - either removed entirely, or replaced with a scolding message. 
- For direct links (single item and seller pages), sellers will have their names marked in red and an indication that they are on your block list.
- Block list is case insensitive.
- Can block sellers on all Circlly sales sites.
